name: Gyakuten Saiban 4 (Genteiban)
description:
Limited Edition boxed package of Gyakuten Saiban 4, also known as Apollo Justice: Ace Attorney, was released only in Japan and includes the following content:
  • Gyakuten Saiban 4 game
  • Gyakuten Saiban Jiten - an NDS encyclopedia containing info about the first three Gyakuten Saiban (a.k.a. Ace Attorney) games including the story about cases, locations, characters and character animations, and background music
  • Gyakuten Saiban Douga - bonus DVD with teasers, trailers and TV commercials from all four Gyakuten Saiban games

shot.caption: Gyakuten Saiban Jiten - You can check info on first three games, plus the bonus case included in NDS release of the original.
